Artificial culture of bacteria vam
    Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Experimental Biology under the Academy of Sciences has succeeded in the artificial culture of bacteria vam.
 It, recognized as efficacious microbiological fertilizer, had been cultured only by plant roots.    
 The new method shortens the period of culture one-tenth and reduces the production cost one-1,000th as compared with the method of natural culture.

articles.title: Chinese government to donate diesel oil to DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese government to donate diesel oil to DPRK
    Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- The government of China recently decided to donate 10,000 tons of diesel oil to the DPRK.

International Conference for peace to be held
    Pyongyang, July 16 (KCNA) -- An International Conference for Peace on the Korean Peninsula and Solidarity Functions will be held in Pyongyang from July 23 to 27 under the co-sponsorship of International Democratic Organizations and the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory in the Great Fatherland Liberation War.
